title: 2016 NA LCS Summer Split Schedule
body: Below is the full Summer Split schedule with a breakdown of each match time, streaming channel, and NA LCS studio location. For more information about the changes coming to the Summer Split, head on over to our NA LCS Summer Survival Guide.

CLG CLG CLG
Looking into going to a match on July 15th, but noticing those are taking place earlier in the day than the rest of the Friday matches. Is that a mistype, or just randomly changing time?
It was a mistype and it's all fixed now. Thanks for pointing it out and I hope you make it out to the NA LCS matches on July 15.

Where did Team Envy come from? I understand that Renegades and Team Impulse got banned, but I never heard of Team Envy. I know TDK and APEX were in the challenger series, but I haven't heard of Team Envy. And what does this mean for the team that takes Impulse's place?

TiP, TDK, and Renegades were all forced to sell their spots, so if you were thinking that everyone just gets bumped up in ranking you would be mistaken. They basically just bought the spot, called it EnVyUs, and have started building their roster. TDK and TiP still haven't sold their spots I think, but the same thing will happen with both of them.
Team envy is the league team of esports organization EnVyUs, they do games like cs go and cod as well
Are the times on here for PST?
The times that are in the article are all PST.
